prompt_description: Extract tasks/paradigms or interventions described in the text. Produce one extraction per distinct task/intervention. If a single task/intervention is described with multiple variants (e.g., left/right/both ear stimulation, on/off, sham/active), create one task and list the variants as conditions instead of separate tasks.

examples.text: Participants performed a Stroop task with incongruent and congruent trials in a blocked design.
Subjects underwent TaVNS in the left, right, and both ears during the MRI session.

extractions.extraction_text: TaVNS in the left, right, and both ears
